author: Al Jazeera
title: Do not push Rohingya out to sea amid coronavirus emergency: UNHCR
description: Refugee advocates say fear of Rohingya refugees carrying the virus is not an excuse to refuse them asylum.
content: Stateless Rohingya refugees who have fled Myanmar by boat face a "dire, and in many cases fatal  predicament" at sea, and countries in the region should allow them to disembark on humanitarian grounds despite the coronavirus health crisis, the United Nations … [+2958 chars]
